channel.title: Help with changing the background
channel.description:
Hey guys I downloaded 317 Bronze Age client, the only problem is I want to change the background also the flames but it has no sprites in to change it, so I guess the image is coded in somewhere. The reason I have decided to download Bronze Ages is because I wanted the 2004 game frame and not to mention that the clips are perfect for me.
Image: [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/i2ops5.jpg[/img]

item.title: Help with changing the background
item.dc:creator: @iiLovePVP iiLovePVP
item.description:
@iiLovePVP wrote:

Hmm if it has auto cache downloader you need to get the cache change the background and reupload.
Also If the cache is already inside the client you open it up find the background pic and compile. Easy Peasyâ€¦
Though Im Not Sure You Have To Compile

Read full topic
